/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. A few pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. Parked cars are neatly lined up on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. In the distance, modern buildings rise, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a beautiful blend of nature and urban life, showcasing the harmonious coexistence of the two in Beijing.
